name: Text to JSON Converter
author: AWENK AUDICO & Gemini
description: Converts a plain text string into a structured list of JSON objects based on user-defined delimiters and keys.

properties.label: loc.prop_source_text_label
properties.description: The payload variable path containing the raw text to be converted.

properties.label: loc.prop_line_delimiter_label
properties.description: The character that separates each record or line. Use '\n' for new lines.

properties.label: loc.prop_value_delimiter_label
properties.description: The character that separates values within a single line.

properties.label: loc.prop_key_names_label
properties.description: A comma-separated list of key names for the JSON object.

output_schema.name: data.json_data
output_schema.description: The resulting list of JSON objects after conversion.
